block.p: Deanna J. Welch, the daughter of Alexander D. Welch and Anne Marie Kelly-Welch of Princeton, N.J., was married there yesterday to Stephen T. Tallon, a son of Patricia Tallon of Dublin and the late Justin D. Tallon. The Rev. David Davis performed the ceremony at Nassau Presbyterian Church.
Mrs. Tallon, 26, works in New York for Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, where she writes and edits speeches and press releases. She graduated cum laude from Barnard College.

Deanna J. Welch, the daughter of Alexander D. Welch and Anne Marie Kelly-Welch of Princeton, N.J., was married there yesterday to Stephen T. Tallon, a son of Patricia Tallon of Dublin and the late Justin D. Tallon. The Rev. David Davis performed the ceremony at Nassau Presbyterian Church.
Mrs. Tallon, 26, works in New York for Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, where she writes and edits speeches and press releases. She graduated cum laude from Barnard College.
Mr. Tallon, 42, is the advertising director for The Journal of Commerce, a weekly shipping industry magazine in New York. His previous marriage ended in divorce.
